messages.title: Their extreme Brexit will wreck Britain...
The Liberal Democrats are fighting for a brighter future for Britain...
messages.content: ...if you want to stop an extreme Brexit join millions like you who are voting Lib Dem this time.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats promise to prevent extreme Brexit and fight for Britain's future.

issues.brexitEurope: The leaflet emphasizes the Liberal Democrats' opposition to 'extreme Brexit' and suggests that they are fighting against it.

endorsements.endorsement: "Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called the Leader of the Opposition."
"The Lib Dems... have vowed to fight us every step of the way."

quotes.text: "Jeremy Corbyn throws in the towel and confirms Brexit. He has aligned the Labour Party with UKIP."
"The Lib Dems... have vowed to fight us every step of the way."

images.caption: Images of key political figures and crowds with flags and signs depicting the Liberal Democrats' stance on Brexit.
